name: Dark Universe RTS
description:
Dark Universe RTS

Dark Universe is an online real time strategy game.

Device requirements:

  • Any screen size
    • Landscape
    • Fullscreen or windowed
  • Any input device
    • Touch
    • Mouse + left/right click
    • Gamepad + A/B button (Gopher360)

Credits: Sounds and spacestation image from Kenney.nl, Space background from Pixabay.com.
